channel.title: Jupyter-notebook on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter-notebook on Some Title

item.title: Free Python execution environment Google Colaboratory memo
item.description: # What is Google Colaboratory Jupyter notebook environment running on Google’s cloud. https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/welcome.ipynb It’s free to use and no environment is required, so it’s convenient for learning Python. In addition, GPU and TPU can be used to reduce machine learning execution time. usage limit It is available free of charge, but there is a 12 hour continuous usage limit. Be careful when using machine learning for a long time because the virtual machine will be disconnected after 12 hours.
